RateLawGroupCollection Class Reference

Manages a collection of RateLawGroup objects such that only one object of any RateLawGroup type is ever created in each collection. More...

Detailed Description

Manages a collection of RateLawGroup objects such that only one object of any RateLawGroup type is ever created in each collection.
